name: Topside Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although we never had any interest in staying at a B&B, Topside was in a perfect location so we decided to spend a couple of nights there. Now the bar is set very high for any other B&B we might try. We stayed in the main house in a room with an amazing view. The food was delicious, and Ed and Brian were friendly and helpful. Typically, we don't like to do much sitting when we travel, but we had to take time to just relax on the porch and enjoy the quiet and the ocean. Our first B&B experience couldn't have been better!
reviews.title: A Wonderful Experience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a stay at the Topside Inn. We chose it based on all the positive reviews on TripAdvisor and now that we're back we want to add to them. As the main house was fully booked, we spent the first couple of nights in the Windward annex, in a room with a wonderful view and a useful fridge. We then moved to room 3 in the main house, which had an even better view and a huge bathroom!
reviews.title: Wonderful
Nice location
reviews.text: Ed's breakfasts were different every day and always delicious and Brian gave us some really great ideas on where we could spend the day - he got it right every tiime! Everything we needed was provided and the only thing we felt we could have done with was a fridge in our room of the main house but that was only because we'd got used to having one in the other room and it wasn't really essential as we just used the ice bucket provided instead.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is perfect for exploring Boothbay Harbor as we never needed the car for anything while in the town - everything is walking distance.
reviews.title: Fantastic location! Superb accomodations.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We love Maine and have tried to go to a different area each time we visit so I'm not sure when we'll be back in Boothbay, but we would definitely come back to the Topside Inn again if we do. Can't recommend it enough!
reviews.title: Wonderful Retreat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been staying in Boothbay Harbor over the July 4th holiday for many years. Three years ago we decided to try the Topside Inn and have never looked back! The property is well maintained and exceptionally clean. Brian and Ed are wonderful hosts and have thought of every detail when it comes to providing a comfortable and inviting place for their guests to relax. The breakfasts prepared by Ed are "to die for". I miss them already and can't wait to see what will be on the menu next year! We highly recommend this property. We will be making another reservation soon and encourage anyone else planning to visit this lovely town to do the same!
reviews.title: Top On Our List

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Barbara & Mark V.
reviews.title: The Best Of Booth Bay Harbor

reviews.text: 7th time to Booth Bay Harbor. Tried 3 other B and B's, Topside is the "tops". The rooms are very comfortable and well adorned. And the view as well as the marvelous breakfast - not to mention the freshly cooked cookies daily!!! Brian and Ed know what they are doing. Just outside of town up on the hill, but a 7 minute walk and you are in the heart of Booth Bay. We will be back again next year. !!
reviews.title: Very comfortable and relaxing.

reviews.text: The view was wonderful, room was nicely appointed, breakfast was delicious. Brian and Ed are warm and welcoming. The price was reasonable too. We would stay there again. Loved Boothbay Harbor! What a quaint harbor town. There is plenty of lobster to be eaten!
reviews.title: Top Stay at the Topside Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stay in B&B's often for both personal and business trips and this property was one of the best I have ever experienced. Brian and Ed do everything possible to make each person's stay a fantastic one from the home cooked gourmet breakfasts to the decor and the 'amenities.' Often when traveling, I am always running to the store for something or another, and at Topside, they have thought all this through and provide most everything for you. From all types of different glassware, to bar supplies, ice buckets, 24/7 tea and coffee, small snacks and treats, suntan lotion and bug spray. Just an excellent place!
reviews.title: Topside - Top B&B!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the umpteenth time we have stayed at the Topside Inn, Boothbay Harbor, ME. Brian and Ed again gave us our "normal" front facing Room #4, looking out at the harbor. What makes staying here so much fun for the two of us, is mingling with the people, and catching up with Brian and Ed's "goings on". This is probably the one place in the world that feels almost like "home", I can't envision staying anywhere else while in Boothbay Harbor.
reviews.title: Another amazing stay

reviews.text: Couldn't have been better. All the great parts of a B&B without the feeling like you were staying at grandmas house or forced to chat with other guests. Best granola I've ever had!
reviews.title: Perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed here multiple times over several years and rated it before. It remains the best place to stay in Boothbay Harbor. Brian & Ed anticipate the needs of the guests and maintain a very high level of quality and service. Breakfasts are terrific, something new every day, and the presentation is top notch. The inn is clean, period. They (Brian & Ed) are great hosts and do their best to make everyone feel at home.
reviews.title: Staying Consistent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed for 2 nights in late June 2012 and we cannot stop singing the praises of Brian and Ed. From their friendly welcome to their attentive service at breakfast and local knowledge they were always first class. However what made them exceptional was the way they responded when I took ill at the Inn (nothing to do with the Topside). They not only called an ambulance promptly but also drove my wife to the hospital and collected both of us when I was discharged about 7 hours later at 11pm. They had carefully moved all our luggage and property from our top floor room into a ground floor room for easier access. They even took time to prepare something to eat for us on our arrival back at the Inn. Their reassurance and assistance was greatly appreciated and much more than we would have expected.
reviews.title: Service Above and Beyond

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Inn itself is in an excellent location overlooking the town with some fantastic views of the harbor and within easy walking distance of the local shops and restaurants. It was very clean, quiet and comfortable and the food was plentiful and delicious. I would highly recommend The Topside Inn to anyone visiting Boothbay Harbor.
reviews.title: The best place to stay in the boothbay area
Top Notch!
reviews.text: What a great place to stay! It all starts with the location. Convenient with a fantastic view of the bay. The room was comfortable and well appointed. The bathroom was huge! Best place to stay for Windjammer Days.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just spent 3 wonderful nights in Room 9. Beautiful view and lovely furnishings. This was our second time here and we will definitely be back! Brian and Ed are wonderful hosts, happy to help with dining suggestions and things to do. We look forward to the delicious breakfasts each morning that Ed prepares. Wonderful location, short walk down the hill to restaurants and shops but so peaceful and quiet with gorgeous views of the harbor. We have also stayed in room 8 which has a good view with a nice private deck and covered porch.
reviews.title: Love it here!

reviews.text: We had a great time. We have stayed there many times and it has always been a great experiance. Brian and Ed are wonderful hosts. Their breakfasts are unique and excellant. Brian and Ed treat you like family. We also took the boat trip to the lobster an clam bake on Cabbage Island. You should be sure not to miss this.
reviews.title: The best B&B on the Maine coast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here during Boothbay Harbor's Windjammer Days.The inn sits in a very convenient, delightful spot on the hilltop, with plenty of parking and garden carts to haul your things in from the car. It is not your typical B & B, but perfect if you are looking for a Maine cottage experience. I love the nautical decor of the rooms. No need for AC, beautiful ocean breeze through open windows. There are lovely, well tended flower beds. Food (scrambled eggs with cheese and spinach and ham on the side) was delicious! Brian and Ed are great hosts.
reviews.title: Wonderfully relaxing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I could sum our review of Brian and Ed's place as two words... "Stay Here".
reviews.title: Topside = TopShelf

description: Enjoy incredible views of scenic Boothbay Harbor, Maine from the top of the hill at Topside Inn, a bed & breakfast set in a beautiful 19th-century sea captain's home and two summer guesthouses. You'll find a warm welcome, comfort and style with modern amenities, fabulous breakfasts, and easy access to shopping, restaurants, boat excursions, botanical gardens, hiking trails and much more.
